title: Did California try to force parents to accept a curriculum that teaches children "there are 15 sexes "?
subtitle: The websites of the conservatives were outraged at what they described as "compulsory instruction sessions" on the gender identity of K-12 students.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In 2019, California's education authorities developed a policy that, if implemented, would force parents to allow their children to learn that "there are 15 sexes."
